title: Animals, Animals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 268 words, Level K (Grade 2), Lexile 480L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     E		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     E and H

description: Animals, Animals is about some of the fascinating animals in our world. Each page describes interesting facts and brings the world of animals to the reader. Pictures enhance the text. Book and lesson also available at Levels E and H.
highFrequencyWords: antlers, burrow, camel, coat, elephants, elk, fox, giraffes, grasslands, hippopotamus, kangaroo, manes, polar bears, pouch, savannas, snow leopards, trunks, zebra
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ee and ea
awareness: Adjectives                : Identify adjectives and the nouns they describe
grammar:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
